name: Kanken 2級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 醜悪
cards.meaning: ugly, unsightly, hideous, mean, repulsive, disgraceful

cards.question: 会釈
cards.meaning: slight bow (as a greeting or sign of gratitude), nod, salutation

cards.question: 回向
cards.meaning: Buddhist memorial service, prayers for the repose of the soul

cards.question: 漆
cards.meaning: seven, lacquer, varnish, japan, seven (used in legal documents)

cards.question: 椅子
cards.meaning: chair, stool, traditional square chair with armrests and a torii-shaped back (used by the emperor, etc. during ceremonies)

cards.question: 挨拶
cards.meaning: greeting, greetings, salutation, salute, polite set phrase used when meeting or parting from somebody

cards.question: 産着
cards.meaning: clothes for a newborn baby, baby clothes

cards.question: 疎遠
cards.meaning: estrangement, alienation, neglecting to stay in contact

cards.question: 諦観
cards.meaning: clear vision, resignation (as in reconciling oneself)

cards.question: 唾棄
cards.meaning: despising, disdaining, scorning, holding in contempt

cards.question: 妬む
cards.meaning: to be jealous of, to envy, to begrudge

cards.question: 拉致
cards.meaning: taking captive, carrying away, kidnapping, kidnaping, abduction

cards.question: 僅差
cards.meaning: narrow margin (esp. victory or defeat), slim margin

cards.question: 籠城
cards.meaning: holding a castle (during a siege), holing up

cards.question: 山麓
cards.meaning: foot of a mountain, base of a mountain

cards.question: 虎口
cards.meaning: tiger's den, jaws of death, dangerous place

cards.question: 牙城
cards.meaning: stronghold (esp. of an enemy or opponent), inner citadel, bastion

cards.question: 俳諧
cards.meaning: haikai, collective name for haiku, haibun, haiga, senryū, etc.

cards.question: 形骸化
cards.meaning: becoming a mere shell, becoming a dead letter, losing (one's) substance, being reduced to a formality

cards.question: 柿
cards.meaning: kaki, Japanese persimmon (Diospyros kaki), chopped wood, wood chips

cards.question: 葛藤
cards.meaning: conflict, complication, troubles, discord, Chinese moonseed (Sinomenium acutum)

cards.question: 釜飯
cards.meaning: rice, meat and vegetable dish served in a small pot

cards.question: 乞う
cards.meaning: to beg, to ask, to request, to invite

cards.question: 頓挫
cards.meaning: setback, deadlock, being at a standstill or impasse

cards.question: 拭浄
cards.meaning: wiping and purifying, wiping and cleansing

cards.question: 目尻
cards.meaning: outer canthus, outer corner of the eye

cards.question: 呪縛
cards.meaning: spell (that restricts one's movements), binding spell

cards.question: 必須
cards.meaning: indispensable, essential, requisite, required, compulsory, necessary

cards.question: 煎る
cards.meaning: to parch, to fry, to fire, to broil, to roast, to boil down (in oil)

cards.question: 丼勘定
cards.meaning: rough estimate, sloppy accounting, slapdash bookkeeping

cards.question: 八百長
cards.meaning: match fixing, put-up job, fixed game

cards.question: 葬る
cards.meaning: to bury, to inter, to entomb

cards.question: 捻出
cards.meaning: contriving (to raise funds, to find time, etc.)

cards.question: 綻びる
cards.meaning: to come apart at the seams, to be ripped, to be torn

cards.question: 傑物
cards.meaning: great man, heroic figure, remarkable character

cards.question: 旨
cards.meaning: principle, aim, main purpose, central part, pillar

cards.question: 貪る
cards.meaning: to covet, to crave, to lust insatiably for

cards.question: 配膳
cards.meaning: setting a place, setting the table

cards.question: 焼酎
cards.meaning: shochu, Japanese spirit distilled from sweet potatoes, rice, etc.

cards.question: 訃報
cards.meaning: news of a person's death, obituary

cards.question: 拝謁
cards.meaning: having an audience with someone of very high social standing (e.g. the emperor)

cards.question: 殻
cards.meaning: shell, husk, hull, pod, chaff, chicken bones (e.g. for soup), chicken carcass, shell (e.g. electron shell), egg, eggshell

cards.question: 競う
cards.meaning: to compete, to contend, to vie, to contest

cards.question: 浄瑠璃
cards.meaning: type of dramatic recitation accompanied by a shamisen (associated with the Japanese puppet theater)

cards.question: 充填
cards.meaning: filling (up), replenishing, filling in (tooth), loading (gun with ammunition, camera with film, etc.), packing, plugging

cards.question: 尻餅
cards.meaning: falling on one's backside (behind, bottom), pratfall

cards.question: 頬張る
cards.meaning: to stuff one's cheeks, to fill one's mouth (with food)

cards.question: 爪先
cards.meaning: toes, tips of the toes, toe of a shoe, sock, etc.

cards.question: 夢枕
cards.meaning: at the bedside where one dreams

cards.question: 梨
cards.meaning: nashi (Pyrus pyrifolia, esp. var. culta), Japanese pear, Asian pear, sand pear, apple pear

cards.question: 妖しい
cards.meaning: suspicious, dubious, doubtful, dodgy, suspicious (referring to a potential amorous relation), dangerous (e.g. financial situation), ominous (e.g. weather), strange, shady, fishy

cards.question: 鬱積
cards.meaning: accumulation (e.g. of emotions, grievances, etc.), buildup, suppression (e.g. of anger)

cards.question: 貼る
cards.meaning: to stick, to paste, to affix

cards.question: 深更
cards.meaning: middle of the night, dead of night, midnight

cards.question: 命乞い
cards.meaning: begging for one's life, pleading for one's life

cards.question: 払拭
cards.meaning: wiping out, sweeping away, eradicating, dispelling

cards.question: 臆する
cards.meaning: to be hesitant, to feel timid

cards.question: 稚拙
cards.meaning: unskillful, childish, immature, naive, artless, clumsy, crude

cards.question: 色艶
cards.meaning: colour and lustre, color and luster, complexion, colour, color

cards.question: 尻拭い
cards.meaning: cleaning up or covering for another, bearing the consequences of someone else's error, paying a debt for someone, wiping another's buttocks

cards.question: 渉外
cards.meaning: public relations, client liaison, client relations

cards.question: 僅少
cards.meaning: (a) few, (a) little, trifling, insignificant, small (amount), scarce (stocks)

cards.question: 緻密
cards.meaning: minute, fine, delicate, accurate, precise, elaborate

cards.question: 翻弄
cards.meaning: trifling with, toying with, playing with, making sport of, making fun of, leading around by the nose

cards.question: 爪牙
cards.meaning: claws and fangs, claws and tusks

cards.question: 担う
cards.meaning: to carry on shoulder, to shoulder (gun)

cards.question: 愛玩
cards.meaning: caring for (esp. a pet or a small object), cherishing, being fond of, prizing, treasuring

cards.question: 挫折
cards.meaning: setback, failure (e.g. plans, business), frustration, discouragement

cards.question: 嘲る
cards.meaning: to scoff, to laugh at, to make fun of, to ridicule, to jeer at

cards.question: 麓
cards.meaning: foot (of a mountain or hill), bottom, base

cards.question: 会得
cards.meaning: understanding, comprehension, grasp, perception, appreciation, mastery (of an art or skill)

cards.question: 偽
cards.meaning: imitation, fake, phony, counterfeit, forged, bogus, sham, falseness (logic), falsehood

cards.question: 瓦石
cards.meaning: worthless thing, garbage, roof tile and stone

cards.question: 塞ぐ
cards.meaning: to stop up, to close up, to block (up), to plug up, to shut up, to cover (ears, eyes, etc.), to close (eyes, mouth)

cards.question: 煎餅
cards.meaning: rice cracker, Japanese cracker, rice cookie, wafer

cards.question: 比肩
cards.meaning: ranking equal with, comparing favourably with, comparing favorably with

cards.question: 陥れる
cards.meaning: to trick someone into (committing a crime, etc.), to hatch a plan and deceive someone

cards.question: 爪弾き
cards.meaning: black sheep (of a family), ostracism, playing with one's fingers (a guitar, etc.)

cards.question: 葛根湯
cards.meaning: infusion of kudzu, cinnamon, etc., used as an antifebrile, for hangovers, etc.

cards.question: 鏡餅
cards.meaning: mirror-shaped mochi, usu. a pair stacked in order of size with a daidai on top, used as a New Year offering, then cut and eaten on January 11.

cards.question: 拘泥
cards.meaning: adhering to, being a stickler for, being particular about, worrying too much about

cards.question: 据える
cards.meaning: to place (in position), to fix, to set (e.g. table), to lay (foundation)

cards.question: 俊才
cards.meaning: prodigy, talented person, person of exceptional talent, genius

cards.question: 詮索
cards.meaning: inquiry into, enquiry into, prying (into), investigation, search, exploration

cards.question: 溺れる
cards.meaning: to drown, to nearly drown, to sink below the surface (of water)

cards.question: 勃興
cards.meaning: sudden rise to power, sudden rise in prosperity

cards.question: 毀誉
cards.meaning: praise and censure, approval and disapproval, approbation and condemnation

cards.question: 煎茶
cards.meaning: green tea, green leaf tea, non-powdered tea (as opposed to matcha)

cards.question: 火蓋
cards.meaning: apron of a gun, cover for the touch-hole on a cannon or matchlock

cards.question: 桁違い
cards.meaning: an order of magnitude higher, off by a digit, in a different league, unbelievable, incomparable, unimaginable

cards.question: 音頭
cards.meaning: leading a group of people, someone who leads others into a song by singing the leading notes

cards.question: 冥土
cards.meaning: Hades, the underworld, the other world, realm of the dead

cards.question: 錦秋
cards.meaning: autumn where the foliage is as beautiful as brocade, autumn with beautiful leaves

cards.question: 叱る
cards.meaning: to scold, to chide, to rebuke, to reprimand

cards.question: 整頓
cards.meaning: orderliness, put in order, tidying up, arranging neatly

cards.question: 辛辣
cards.meaning: bitter (e.g. criticism), sharp, biting, severe, scathing, harsh

cards.question: 窮める
cards.meaning: to carry to extremes, to go to the end of something

cards.question: 弥生
cards.meaning: third month of the lunar calendar

cards.question: 泥縄
cards.meaning: measure taken too late, measure taken in haste

cards.question: 偏窟
cards.meaning: eccentric, warped, narrow-minded, perverse, obstinate, stubborn, bigoted

cards.question: 痩せる
cards.meaning: to become thin, to lose weight, to reduce (one's) weight, to slim

cards.question: 反物
cards.meaning: fabric, cloth, textiles, drapery, dry-goods, piece goods

cards.question: 諦念
cards.meaning: understanding and acceptance, spiritual awakening, a heart that understands truth, (feeling of) resignation

cards.question: 鎌首
cards.meaning: sickle-shaped neck (e.g. snake, praying mantis), crooked neck, gooseneck

cards.question: 罵る
cards.meaning: to abuse (verbally), to curse at, to shout abuse at, to speak ill of

cards.question: 倣う
cards.meaning: to imitate, to follow, to emulate
